\index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 503@\spxentry{PEP 503}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0503}{\sphinxstylestrong{PEP 503}} is the specification for PyPI’s \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{/simple}} repository API, used by tools such as pip.

\index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 503\#normalized\sphinxhyphen{}names@\spxentry{PEP 503\#normalized\sphinxhyphen{}names}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0503\#normalized-names}{\sphinxstylestrong{PEP 503\#normalized\sphinxhyphen{}names}}

The \index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 621\#name@\spxentry{PEP 621\#name}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0621\#name}{name} is \index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 503\#normalized\sphinxhyphen{}names@\spxentry{PEP 503\#normalized\sphinxhyphen{}names}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0503\#normalized-names}{normalized} per \index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 503@\spxentry{PEP 503}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0503}{\sphinxstylestrong{PEP 503}}

\index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 621\#version@\spxentry{PEP 621\#version}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0621\#version}{version} must be a valid per \index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 440@\spxentry{PEP 440}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0440}{\sphinxstylestrong{PEP 440}}

\index{Python Enhancement Proposals@\spxentry{Python Enhancement Proposals}!PEP 621\#requires\sphinxhyphen{}python@\spxentry{PEP 621\#requires\sphinxhyphen{}python}}\sphinxhref{https://peps.python.org/pep-0621\#requires-python}{requires\sphinxhyphen{}python} maps to \index{Core Metadata Field Requires\sphinxhyphen{}Python@\spxentry{Core Metadata Field Requires\sphinxhyphen{}Python}}\sphinxhref{https://packaging.python.org/specifications/core-metadata/\#requires-python}{Requires\sphinxhyphen{}Python}

The project’s \index{Core Metadata Field description@\spxentry{Core Metadata Field description}}\sphinxhref{https://packaging.python.org/specifications/core-metadata/\#description}{description} may have multiple lines.

A wheel’s \index{Core Metadata Field Supported\sphinxhyphen{}Platform@\spxentry{Core Metadata Field Supported\sphinxhyphen{}Platform}}\sphinxhref{https://packaging.python.org/specifications/core-metadata/\#supported-platform}{supported platforms} specify the OS and CPU for which the binary distribution was compiled.

Values in TOML must be one of the following types:
\begin{itemize}
\item {}
\index{TOML: String@\spxentry{TOML: String}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#string}{String}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Integer@\spxentry{TOML: Integer}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#integer}{Integer}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Float@\spxentry{TOML: Float}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#float}{Float}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Boolean@\spxentry{TOML: Boolean}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#boolean}{Boolean}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Offset Date\sphinxhyphen{}Time@\spxentry{TOML: Offset Date\sphinxhyphen{}Time}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#offset-date-time}{Offset Date\sphinxhyphen{}Time}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Local Date\sphinxhyphen{}Time@\spxentry{TOML: Local Date\sphinxhyphen{}Time}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#local-date-time}{Local Date\sphinxhyphen{}Time}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Local Date@\spxentry{TOML: Local Date}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#local-date}{Local Date}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Local Time@\spxentry{TOML: Local Time}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#local-time}{Local Time}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Array@\spxentry{TOML: Array}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#array}{Array}

\item {}
\index{TOML: Inline Table@\spxentry{TOML: Inline Table}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#inline-table}{Inline Table}

\end{itemize}

\index{TOML: Inline Table@\spxentry{TOML: Inline Table}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#inline-table}{Inline Tables} must be on a single line.

Unlike in YAML, a \index{TOML: string@\spxentry{TOML: string}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#string}{string} must be surrounded by quotation marks.

You can place multiple objects in an \index{TOML: array@\spxentry{TOML: array}}\sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#array}{array}.

The following xrefs are not indexed: \sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#float}{Float} \sphinxhref{https://toml.io/en/v0.5.0\#array}{array}.

\begin{itemize}
\item {}

{\hyperref[\detokenize{index:tconf-project.name}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{project.name}}}}} and {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:tconf-project.version}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{version}}}}} are required.
Some backends may be able to determine a value for {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:tconf-project.version}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{version}}}}} dynamically.

{\hyperref[\detokenize{index:tconf-description}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{description}}}}} will be displayed this towards the top of the project page on PyPI.

Links can also be written with a shorter name: {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:tconf-project.name}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{name}}}}}.
